name: Pixel Jewellery Week
description:
It's that time of the year, when the contemporary jewellers flock together to exhibit, perform, interact, talk, chat, gossip.

Use the arrow key to explore the streets of Pixel City and try to fit as many events as you can in your day. Be kind to yourself and don't forget to take a break.

A small interactive experience to be played in your browser, trying to recreate the frantic, exciting, exhausting, inspiring experience of visiting a Jewellery Week.

Credits:

made with Bitsy and enhanced with Borksy

thanks to Caeth for the minimap idea and the whole Bitscord for the support
